articles.author: Paul Tassi
articles.title: Huge ‘Palworld’ Patch Adds Raid Boss, New Gear, New Buildings - Forbes
articles.description: Here are the patch notes for Palworld's huge new update which adds a raid boss and a bunch of other new tools and buildings to craft.
articles.content:
Palworld
Pocketpair
Arguably the single biggest content-adding patch since Palworlds launch has arrived. With it comes a massive new Pal to fight, but also loads of additions to players collections… [+2755 chars]
